string.value: After taking a stroll around Showa Town, I should start up a conversation with Skye.
Skye offered to take me to Orbis. Once I get there, she advised me to look for Elma...
I was able to meet up with Elma. Where will I go next?
Alright, isn't this place fun? Obviously there are some interesting people in this town. Ready to go to the next spot?
Alright, I'll send you to Orbis the land of the elevated.
Once you arrive there, talk to #eElma#n, and she'll take you to another spot.
Oh yeah, if you step outside, you'll encounter cute yet very violent monsters, so be careful of them.
Hey,do you really like it here? There's plenty of time, so have yourself a ball here before leaving this place!
Welcome! What else did Skye tell you about this place? Orbis is a place where the air's clean, and everything seems elevated.
